EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-08-30-CAE-NewYork-092817-1.ES-2017-08-30-CAE-NewYork-092817-17
EmailTemplate.subject: You’re Invited: Turbonomic Community Appreciation at The Golf Club
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an upcoming event on September 28th as we brush up on our golfing skills with Presidio and the help of a golf pro. We are expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, golf. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry. The Golf Club at Chelsea Piers <[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]>
59 Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011 Thursday, September 28th 5:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]>
We hope to see you there.
- The Turbonomic Team
